entities.name: knight bus
entities.description: The Knight Bus is a magical vehicle that can take people anywhere on land. It has headlamps and was empty at the time of Harry's encounter.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is a driver of the Knight Bus who is suspicious of Harry and asks him questions about his scar and identity.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is trying to avoid detection by the Ministry of Magic. He is on the run and uses Neville Longbottom as an alias.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is an organization that is looking for Harry, who has a scar on his forehead.

entities.name: nevile longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is a name used by Harry as an alias to avoid detection by the Ministry of Magic.
